Articles.Content:
RoboCorp presents a new vehicle for the world leaders of tomorrow:

The Assault Rover:

Landing:

Landed:

Firering:

At the tip of a long range missile, the Assault Rover detatch and deploys it\'s radial parachute (by Capt. Slug) avoids air defences with RCS and lands safely at +20 m/s using the advanced suspension in its hstwcart (by Tosh http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=8431.0).

It then fires it\'s dual railguns (by JellyCubes) to utterly destroy ground based targets.

Fast, Flexible, Deadly.

railguns may need tuneing, deployment missile not included, needed parts (exept cart) included in .zip, credit for 3rd party parts goes to the respective creators.
I was wondering how long it would take for someone to put guns on the cart.
Try this on the moon, land with rcs like real munar rovers like MSL.
